Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.name: constrain(_:_:_:)
Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.abstract: Constrains a value between a minimum and maximum value.

Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.name: lerp(_:_:_:)
Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.abstract: Calculates a number between two numbers at a specific increment

Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.name: mag(_:_:)
Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.abstract: Calculates the magnitude (or length) of a vector

Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.name: map(_:_:_:_:_:_:)
Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.abstract: Re-maps a number from one range to another.

Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.name: max(_:)
Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.abstract: Determines the largest value in a sequence of numbers, and then returns that value

Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.name: min(_:)
Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.abstract: Determines the smallest value in a sequence of numbers, and then returns that value

Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.name: norm(_:_:_:)
Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.abstract: Normalizes a number from another range into a value between 0 and 1.

Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.name: sq(_:)
Protocols/Calculation.html#/s:15SwiftPro.abstract: Squares a number (multiplies a number by itself).

Protocols/Attributes.html#/s:15SwiftProc.name: strokeWeight(_:)
Protocols/Attributes.html#/s:15SwiftProc.abstract: Sets the width of the stroke used for lines, points and the border around shapes.

Protocols/Attributes.html#/s:15SwiftProc.name: ellipseMode(_:)
Protocols/Attributes.html#/s:15SwiftProc.abstract: Modifies the location from which ellipses, circles, and arcs are drawn. The default mode is CENTER.

Protocols/Shapes.html#/s:15SwiftProcessi.name: point(_:_:)
Protocols/Shapes.html#/s:15SwiftProcessi.abstract: Draws a single point on the screen using the current stroke weight.
